text:
Texas Biomedical Device Center | Dallas, Tx | http://www.utdallas.edu/txbdc/ | Full-Time / Part-Time | ONSITE or REMOTE We are a biomedical research commercialization center for spinning out biomedical research from the University of Texas at Dallas. We're a small, well funded team working on a ton of fascinating projects.

What we're currently hiring for:

Embedded Programmer - ARM Cortex M3 programmer with previous experience on wireless connectivity (bluetooth and zigbee preferred!).

Local is preferred but we can swing some remote work as well.

If you're interested get in touch with me! nate@utdallas.edu
